data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Discuss the use of traditional medicine and modern medicine in your country.
data.answer: Traditional Chinese medicine is designed to help patients achieve and maintain health. Examples of traditional medicine are Chinese herbs and animal products. Due to the development of modern technology, the use of traditional medicine has been decreasing. Most people believe that modern medicine is more effective than traditional medicine. As far as I am concerned, traditional medicine is beneficial to our health in the longer term. Besides, traditional medicine is an essential part of our culture and history; we should protect it from disappearing. （83 字）

options.content: What are some examples of traditional medicine?
Is the use of traditional medicine increasing, decreasing, or remaining the same?
What is your opinion of traditional medicine?
